name: Echoes of an Offering
four_pc: When Normal Attacks hit opponents, there is a 36% chance that it will trigger Valley Rite, which will increase Normal Attack DMG by 70% of ATK. This effect will be dispelled 0.05s after a Normal Attack deals DMG. If a Normal Attack fails to trigger Valley Rite, the odds of it triggering the next time will increase by 20%. This trigger can occur once every 0.2s.

goblet.name: Chalice of the Font
goblet.description: This teacup forever overflows with fresh water. Perhaps it was a gift from an adeptus, one of their relics, or just something they left behind.

plume.name: Jade Leaf
plume.description: A jade ornament shaped like a leaf. It seems to have once had deep meaning between specific friends.

circlet.name: Flowing Rings
circlet.description: A pair of earrings made from a single piece of jade. It has a most gentle texture.

flower.name: Soulscent Bloom
flower.description: A jade carved into the shape of a flower. A phantom scent, here one instant and gone the next, swirls around it.

sands.name: Symbol of Felicitation
sands.description: A circular jade ornament. Legend has it that it was once used somewhere as a symbol for rituals to begin.
